g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'mean execution time in µs' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 350

Y-axis titled 'algorithm with kernel size 16' for a discrete scale with 14 values: (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionKernelOuter, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionTempScaledOuterLoopKernel, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionInnerAndOuterLoopUnrolled, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolution, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionTempScaledKernel, ending with (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionOuterLoopUnrolled
